agents.name: ai_text_generator
agents.description: AI-powered content generation agent. Creates marketing copy, product descriptions, blog articles, social media posts, and any written content using large language models like GPT-4, Claude, or Hugging Face models. Can generate text from scratch or expand existing content. Supports multiple tones (professional, casual, persuasive) and formats.

agents.name: ai_image_generator
agents.description: AI image creation and manipulation agent. Generates images from text descriptions using Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, or Midjourney-style models. Can create product photos, marketing visuals, banners, illustrations, and artwork. Also supports image-to-image transformations, upscaling, and style transfer.

agents.name: ai_translator
agents.description: Multi-language translation agent powered by AI. Translates content between languages while preserving context, tone, and meaning. Supports major languages including English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, and more. Can handle product information, marketing content, and technical documentation. Übersetzen, traduire, traducir, tradurre.

agents.name: ai_classifier
agents.description: AI classification and tagging agent. Automatically analyzes and categorizes content, images, and data. Uses zero-shot and fine-tuned models for image classification, text categorization, sentiment analysis, and automatic tagging. Helps organize content libraries and product catalogs.

agents.name: data_object_manager
agents.description: Core data management agent for Pimcore data objects. Handles creation, modification, deletion, and querying of structured data like products, categories, manufacturers, and any custom entities. Manages object hierarchies, variants, relations, and field-level data. Supports batch operations and complex data structures.

agents.name: asset_manager
agents.description: Digital asset management (DAM) agent. Manages all media files including images, documents, videos, and archives. Handles upload, organization, metadata management, thumbnail generation, and version control. Supports folder structures, tagging, and asset search.

agents.name: document_manager
agents.description: CMS document management agent. Creates and manages web pages, email templates, snippets, links, and printable documents. Handles content areas, editables, and dynamic content. Supports multi-site and multi-language document trees.

agents.name: advanced_search
agents.description: Powerful search and discovery agent using Elasticsearch or OpenSearch. Performs full-text search, faceted filtering, and complex queries across all Pimcore data. Supports fuzzy matching, relevance scoring, aggregations, and saved searches.

agents.name: data_importer
agents.description: Data import agent for bringing external data into Pimcore. Imports from CSV, Excel, XML, JSON files or API endpoints. Supports field mapping, data transformation, validation, and scheduled imports. Handles large datasets with progress tracking and error handling.

agents.name: data_exporter
agents.description: Data export agent for publishing Pimcore data to external systems. Exports to CSV, XML, JSON files or pushes to APIs. Supports configurable field selection, filtering, formatting, and scheduled exports. Can create product feeds for marketplaces.

agents.name: graphql_api
agents.description: GraphQL API agent for programmatic data access. Provides flexible queries and mutations for data objects, assets, and documents. Supports custom schemas, filtering, pagination, and real-time subscriptions through Pimcore Datahub.

agents.name: ecommerce_cart
agents.description: Shopping cart management agent. Handles adding/removing products, quantity updates, cart calculations, and session management. Supports multiple carts per user, guest carts, and cart persistence.

agents.name: ecommerce_checkout
agents.description: Checkout process agent. Manages the complete checkout flow including address collection, shipping method selection, payment processing, and order creation. Supports multi-step checkout, guest checkout, and order confirmation.

agents.name: ecommerce_pricing
agents.description: Pricing and promotion agent. Calculates product prices including base prices, discounts, taxes, and shipping costs. Manages price rules, coupon codes, promotional campaigns, and customer-specific pricing.

agents.name: customer_manager
agents.description: Customer relationship management (CRM) agent. Manages customer profiles, contact information, addresses, preferences, and history. Tracks customer activities, purchases, and interactions. Supports customer authentication and account management.

agents.name: customer_segments
agents.description: Customer segmentation agent. Creates and manages customer groups based on behavior, demographics, purchase history, or custom criteria. Enables targeted marketing, personalized content, and analytics by segment.

agents.name: data_quality
agents.description: Data quality monitoring agent. Evaluates completeness, accuracy, and consistency of data. Calculates quality scores, identifies missing fields, detects duplicates, and generates improvement recommendations.

agents.name: workflow_manager
agents.description: Workflow and state management agent. Controls content lifecycle through configurable workflows. Manages states like draft, review, approved, published. Handles transitions, notifications, and approval processes.

agents.name: automation_runner
agents.description: Task automation agent for Pimcore Copilot. Executes automated actions on data objects and assets. Supports scheduled jobs, batch processing, and multi-step automation pipelines. Can trigger AI actions, data transformations, and notifications.

agents.name: targeting_engine
agents.description: Personalization and targeting agent. Manages visitor targeting rules and personalized content delivery. Analyzes visitor behavior, segments, and context to serve relevant content. Supports A/B testing and conversion optimization.

agents.name: statistics_reporter
agents.description: Analytics and reporting agent. Generates reports, dashboards, and statistics from Pimcore data. Provides insights on products, sales, customers, and content performance. Supports custom metrics and visualizations.

agents.name: webhook_sender
agents.description: Event notification agent. Sends webhook notifications to external systems when events occur in Pimcore. Supports configurable triggers, payload customization, and delivery monitoring. Enables real-time integrations.

agents.name: newsletter_manager
agents.description: Email marketing and newsletter agent. Manages subscriber lists, email campaigns, and marketing automation. Integrates with services like Mailchimp. Tracks opens, clicks, and engagement metrics.

agents.name: portal_content
agents.description: Portal and frontend experience agent. Manages content for customer portals and web experiences. Handles page layouts, widgets, navigation, and user-specific content. Powers headless and hybrid frontend architectures.

agents.name: variant_generator
agents.description: Product variant creation agent. Automatically generates product variants from configurable attributes like size, color, material. Creates SKUs, manages variant relationships, and handles inventory per variant.
